channel.title: Small Help
channel.description:
i need help i need to make object you can get items from it
example :
i have a key id : #### ( for example only) and when i click in that object the key gone and give me 1 item when i click in it
not the same item for example
1 item every 1 click 10 clicks 10 items
maybe this click dfs next time dfh another red p hat
any help guys ?

item.title: Small Help
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“ameer122, post:13, topic:358467”][quote author=i0wn3v3ry link=topic=454973.msg3331581#msg3331581 date=1283528710]

public static int randomlottery[] = {add, items, like, this};
public static int randomlottery() {
return randomlottery[(int) (Math.random() * randomlottery.length)];
}

In item.java, under random barrows.

In client.java

if(UsedOnObjectID == XXX && ItemID == XXX && playerHasItem(XXX)){
deleteItem(XXX, 1);
sM(“Your text here.”);
addItem(randomlottery);
setAnimation(YYY);
}

Try that, not guranteeing it will work.

–edit–

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Off topic-
Please tell me your not planning on releasing your server, cause in the past 2 days, I’ve seen around 20 topic’s of help, just FROM you.
[/quote]

first this code is wrong

second this is help secation im alow to post here 100 post in 1 day

you can answer and you can no

and i dont post if i get 1 error becuase i can fix it

i just post if any (((((good))))) player can give me a code for something

i can fix that errors easy[/quote]

try not to use 5 (s and )s on each side of the word…one is enough. and its kinda like the npc drops, its randomized. more than one and it pick one or two. thats how i see it.

Read full topic

then add this in item2.java if you got one

[quote] public static int Prize[] = {####};

public static int Prize()
{
	return Prize[(int)(Math.random()*Prize.length)];
}[/quote]

i think you know what to do[/quote]

Everytime he gets 1 error, he asks for help, look through the help section, there is like 15 topics just by him.

item.title: Small Help
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

[quote=“ameer122, post:8, topic:358467”][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=454973.msg3331575#msg3331575 date=1283528326]
just add

int item = misc.random(10);

or write “prize” , incase “item” wont work

and more of these

addItem(XXX, 1);

[/quote]

where ??

can you give me a code or tut ?[/quote]

Sorry if I sound like a jerk but noone is going to spoonfeed you everything. Google Java tutorials, so you will understand Java better. This way, you wont always need help. Most of the time you will be able to get things done yourself.

Read full topic
